meanings.definition: Constituting number seventy in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The cake for the seventieth birthday party was decorated with colorful balloons.
meanings.sent2: She received a special gift for her seventieth anniversary at the company.
meanings.sent3: The seventieth attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent4: The seventieth layer of the cake was the most delicious.
meanings.sent5: The seventieth floor of the building offered a breathtaking view of the city.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to seventy in a series.
meanings.sent1: He was excited to celebrate his seventieth with friends and family.
meanings.sent2: The book was on the seventieth shelf in the library.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the seventieth cup on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: She reached the seventieth level in the game after hours of playing.
meanings.sent5: The train arrived at the seventieth station right on time.
